Client Fields

request.description: Get client fields with default configuration (login, name, lastName, email, phone, group, status). No parameters specified - uses default fields, page=1, limit=100.

item.name: Get Client Fields - Login and Email Only

query.description: Only return login and email fields

request.description: Retrieve only login and email fields. Useful for dropdown lists or lightweight data export.
Get complete contact information including location details.
